name: SoulSet
description: SoulSet is a Mystery/Romance Visual Novel, in which you can try to avoid death and pursue a relationship with both male and female characters. You play as Mariko, who finds herself trapped in an eerie mansion with 5 other people who claim to have no recollection of their past. Who will you trust?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP1 and up Processor: 1.7 Ghz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
